moves.1. e4 e5: Pawn to pawn. This is how men begin a fight!
moves.2. Nf3 Nc6: Second game starts exactly like the first. This probably would have turned into an...Italian opening? I think somebody called it that. Just like the Ruey Lopez save white's move three only goes as far as Bc4.

gameName: Cho Knows...How to Run Away Like a Little Sissy Girl!!!He
